title: Chance Triangle Session
synopsis: This anime is based on a 1999 radio drama about three very different girls: Akari, Yuki and Nozomi; going to see the concert of top pop idol Reika and by going to see this concert their lives are greatly influenced by it.
characters: ['Mizushima, Akari', 'Reika', 'Sugino, Shiro', 'Akiba, Kisaragi', 'Aoyama, Yuki', 'Kosaka, Kaito', 'Kaibara, Nozomi', 'Ohishi, Hikoza', 'Kaibara, Madoka', 'Otoki']
voices: ['Iizuka, Mayumi', 'Kouda, Mariko', 'Gouda, Hozumi', 'Enomoto, Atsuko', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Yamamoto, Maria', 'Cho', 'Itou, Miki', 'Kumai, Motoko']
